LongDescription: Racing drive, high speed but fragile
FlavorText:
OSPN NAVY-LINK COMM.
T: OSPN I'm Asking the Questions
F: OSPN Runaway Convictions

-- ATTN CAPT GALT
BOL for a man in a black suit jacket, my crewmen are running their mouths about Lucien (the CEO of Sundrive) making surprise inspections around the station. I don't know about you but that guy puts off a bad aura and I wouldn't leave him unattended around your drive bay if he's actually here, just saying. I can't get any info out of the other ships in the flotilla, so I'm going to assume that the Otdel is doing some sneaky stuff with the whole drive refitting.

Honestly, I'm hoping this goes through. If we get a couple Sundrives hooked up to propulsion, we're going to burning circles around Kribensis and take Thallo before Winchester gets his morning coffee. Kelly's already crunched some numbers and we're looking at a performance increase across the board, can you believe that? Makes me wonder why we're still using tho-

ah hell, Lucien just walked in, I'll talk to you later at the Breach
